title: Feature Store Schematic Schema
description: Creates an NgRx feature store in accordance with the pattern described at http://github.com/ngxtend/isolated-store

feature.description: Name of the feature the store is for

project.description: The project to add the module to, defaults to the default project, usually app

nospec.description: Indicates not to create specs for the feature store elements

storename.description: Name to use for the store module, defaults to <feature>Store
